name: Heroes of the Storm
summary: Heroes of the Storm is a multiplayer online battle arena video game by Blizzard Entertainment. The game brings together characters (known in the game as heroes) from multiple Blizzard universes, such as Warcraft and StarCraft and puts them against each other in an arena in a 5 versus 5 battle. Heroes of the Storm features multiple game modes, such as co-op (PCs vs. NPCs) and versus (PCs vs. PCs).

esrb.synopsis: This is a massive online battle arena game in which players can control characters from several Blizzard games. Players form teams of five and compete to destroy opponents' bases. Gameplay is presented from a pulled-back, overhead perspective, as humans and fantasy creatures use swords, arrows, tanks, firearms, and magical attacks to defeat opponents in frenetic combat. Battles are highlighted by cries of pain and impact sounds; brownish blood puffs appear when heroes are slain. A handful of female characters wear low-cut tops that reveal large amounts of cleavage. Characters sometimes engage in suggestive dialogue/innuendo: “[M]y swords are bigger than yours… Oh, come now, don't be ashamed! It happens to a LOT of men.” During the course of the game, a handful of characters discuss flatulence, emit flatulence, vomit, or emit large pools of “Putrid Bile.” The words “b*tch” and “a*s” appear in the dialogue.
